categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: PS-29-2, nicknamed Mynock, was a male TIE pilot in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. He was part of the Imperial Shadow wing and flew under the call sign Shadow Two. When not tweaking the control systems of his TIE/LN starfighter, he could be found studying Rebel starfighter schematics. His fighter was used to enforce blockades, and had exquisite handling for slashing attacks on unescorted transports and freighters. PS-29-2 wore a black TIE pilot helmet and jumpsuit.
PS-29-2 was created for a card in the Premiere set of Decipher's 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game, with his name simultaneously being used in the gameplay text of a second card in the set.
